test-method.name: verifyCategorySidebarVisibility
test-method.description: Verify that category sidebar is visible and contains main categories.

test-method.name: verifyAllMainCategoriesDisplayed
test-method.description: Verify that all expected main categories are displayed in the sidebar.

test-method.name: verifySubcategoriesAppear
test-method.description: Verify that subcategories appear under main category.

test-method.name: verifySearchCaseInsensitivity
test-method.description: Verify search results for case insensitivity

test-method.name: verifyNoMatchingProductsFound
test-method.description: Verify behavior when no matching products are found

test-method.name: verifySearchWithSpecialCharacters
test-method.description: Verify search functionality with special characters

test-method.name: verifySearchResultsUpdate
test-method.description: Verify that the search results update when a new search is performed

test-method.name: verifySearchTriggerMethods
test-method.description: Verify if search is performed using Enter key and search icon both
